item.title: The True Colours Festival showcases performances by exceptionally talented artists with disabilities
item.description:
The True Colours Festival, showcasing talented performing artists with disabilities from the Asia Pacific region, will run from March 22nd to 25th, 2018 in Singapore. The festival will feature up to 20 artist/troupe performances representing Japan, China, India, Korea, Malaysia, Cambodia, Kazakhstan, New Zealand, Australia, and Singapore. Guest artists from the UK and Canada will also be featured. Performances will take place at a multimedia concert experience inside the Singapore Indoor Stadium and at the nearby True Colours Festival Village...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-true-colours-festival-showcases-performances-by-exceptionally-talented-artists-with-disabilities/

item.title: Hilton guests will enjoy Live Nation experiences
item.description:
Hilton Worldwide and Live Nation, a live entertainment company, have launched a new five-year marketing partnership. This collaboration will provide unique experiences, including artist connections and concerts, to Hilton HHonors members, guests, and employees across Hilton’s global network of over 4,250 hotels. Source:Â Hilton Worldwide. Hilton aims to motivate a new, healthier way of thinking - urging individuals to embrace the unfamiliar, gain perspective, and learn from daily life and travel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hilton-guests-will-enjoy-live-nation-experiences/

item.title: The Singapore International Festival of Music is ready for its October shows
item.description:
The Singapore International Festival of Music (SIFOM), Singapore’s first classical music festival, returns for its second year. Centered around the theme “Myths and Legends,” the festival showcases classical music inspired by folklore and fairy tales. From October 13th to 30th, the festival offers free public programs, masterclasses, and ticketed events including orchestral performances, musical theater, and vocal concerts. The 2016 SIFOM lineup features the festival’s own SIFOM Orchestra and Ensemble, Ding Yi Music Company (showcasing Singapore’s finest young musicians), and internationally-renowned guests from the Chamber Orchestra of Europe (COE), a distinguished chamber orchestra...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-singapore-international-festival-of-music-is-ready-for-its-october-shows/
